about_the_game:
Project_0: A Favor is the first part of a three-part story.
You have entered an experiment where you will have to solve an array of puzzles to help them "understand more stuff."
5 (and soon to be much more) unique handcrafted puzzles in beautiful worlds that challenge your mental skills await your arrival.
Find and use objects in your favor to progress in both the levels and the story.



Find logs and piece together a story about the different people who went through the same thing that you are going through right now and their insights into the world that you have been placed in. The more you learn, the more questions arise. Are you alone? What is this experiment? And will you make it out alive?
The more information you acquire, the more you start to figure out that things are not as they seem and that there is a more sinister side to the story.




Find and collect collectibles hidden throughout the world for nothing else than the fun of it.
Do you get something for it?
Well, not really. 
Okay, I guess we can figure something out. How about two achievements? Is that enough?

Speaking of achievements!


The newest addition to the game has been the integration of Steam achievements. With the addition of a total of 8 achievements, you have more stuff to do than just play the main story. Go back to past levels and find the missing achievements. And when the game gets updated with the latest content update, you can go out in the world and find the new ones or just start all over from the beginning.
detailed_description:
Project_0: A Favor is the first part of a three-part story.
You have entered an experiment where you will have to solve an array of puzzles to help them "understand more stuff."
5 (and soon to be much more) unique handcrafted puzzles in beautiful worlds that challenge your mental skills await your arrival.
Find and use objects in your favor to progress in both the levels and the story.



Find logs and piece together a story about the different people who went through the same thing that you are going through right now and their insights into the world that you have been placed in. The more you learn, the more questions arise. Are you alone? What is this experiment? And will you make it out alive?
The more information you acquire, the more you start to figure out that things are not as they seem and that there is a more sinister side to the story.




Find and collect collectibles hidden throughout the world for nothing else than the fun of it.
Do you get something for it?
Well, not really. 
Okay, I guess we can figure something out. How about two achievements? Is that enough?

Speaking of achievements!


The newest addition to the game has been the integration of Steam achievements. With the addition of a total of 8 achievements, you have more stuff to do than just play the main story. Go back to past levels and find the missing achievements. And when the game gets updated with the latest content update, you can go out in the world and find the new ones or just start all over from the beginning.
name: Project_0: A Favour

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 13400F 2,5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 13400F 2,5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

reviews:
“"is an engrossing game with impressive graphics and a captivating storyline. The gameplay is challenging, yet rewarding, and the characters are well-developed and relatable."”
OFEN™
short_description: Jump into a mysterious world filled with weird favours & puzzles and uncover the truth of what's happening behind the scenes.
